function.name: get_business_availability
function.description: Gets the available time slots for a specific service or date range

service_id.description: ID of the service to check availability for

start_date.description: Start date for availability check in YYYY-MM-DD format

end_date.description: End date for availability check in YYYY-MM-DD format

timezone.description: The timezone to return available slots in (e.g., 'America/Los_Angeles')
